cleaned_text: [r/Meditation](/r/Meditation/) This community is for sharing experiences, stories and instruction relating to the practice of meditation. Energy meditation is an umbrella term that refers to the meditation techniques that focus on cultivating or channeling inner energy to promote improved mental and physical health. This sub doesn't seem to have a lot of discussion on these types of techniques so I figured I would start a discussion about it here. My personal experience with these kinds of methods mainly center around chakra purification and grounding, but I have seen great results from incorporating these methods into my practice. Increased energy throughout the day and an improved mood while going to work are some of the most beneficial side effects of these practices that I've noticed once I started to practice them Have you ever practiced any energy meditation techniques before?
